scripts.uglify: mkdirp dist/assets/scripts && uglifyjs app/common/scripts/*.js -m -o dist/assets/scripts/app.js && uglifyjs app/common/scripts/*.js -m -c -o dist/assets/scripts/app.min.js
scripts.icons: svgo -f app/common/icons && mkdirp dist/assets/images/icons && svg-sprite-generate -d app/common/icons -o dist/assets/images/icons/icons.svg
scripts.build:styles: npm run scss && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.build:scripts: npm run build && npm run uglify
scripts.build:images: npm run imagemin && npm run icons
scripts.build:all: npm run clean && npm run copy && npm run build:styles && npm run build:scripts && npm run templates && npm run build:images
scripts.watch: parallelshell "npm run server" "npm run watch:templates" "npm run watch:styles" "npm run watch:scripts"
scripts.start: npm run build:all && npm run watch
scripts.production: npm run clear && npm run build:all
